statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: There are two kinds of tasks, namely A and B. There are N workers and the i-th worker would like to finish one task A in ai minutes, one task B in bi minutes. Now you have X task A and Y task B, you want to assign each worker some tasks and finish all the tasks as soon as possible. You should note that the workers are working simultaneously.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
In the first line there is an integer T(T<=50), indicates the number of test cases.

In each case, the first line contains three integers N(1<=N<=50), X,Y(1<=X,Y<=200). Then there are N lines, each line contain two integers ai, bi (1<=ai, bi <=1000).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output “Case d: “ at first line where d is the case number counted from one, then output the shortest time to finish all the tasks.
